markdownRemark.html: Situated in the Playa Granada resort in Motril, the Costa Tropical of Granada. The golf course is literally located between the sea and the snow. The course is very flat and has no slopes and is in perfect condition. The location is unbeatable and the views of the sunset is just breathtaking.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf Los Moriscos
frontmatter.description: Club de Golf Los Moriscos - Situated in the Playa Granada resort in Motril, the Costa Tropical of Granada. The golf course is literally located between the sea and the snow. The course is very flat and has no slopes and is in perfect condition. The location is unbeatable and the views of the sunset is just breathtaking.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Playa Granada, Motril, 18600 Granada, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 45.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 45.00 euros
